sentences.en: All the products are labelled with comprehensive instructions.
sentences.cn: 所有产品均标有详尽的使用说明。
务必按厂家的用法说明使用。
按照我们简单的说明，一步一步来。

sentences.en: Follow the instructions on the packet carefully.
sentences.cn: 仔细按照包装上的说明操作。

sentences.en: I approached an Intourist official, as per instructions.
sentences.cn: 我按照指示接洽了一位苏联国际旅行社官员。

sentences.en: Listen carefully to the instructions and jot them down.
sentences.cn: 仔细听指示，并记录下来。

sentences.en: She obeyed his instructions to the letter.
sentences.cn: 她分毫不差地遵照他的吩咐去做。

sentences.en: Take your time, don't cut corners and follow instructions to the letter.
sentences.cn: 慢慢来，不要图省事，要严格按照说明去做。
这说明书看起来很难懂。

sentences.en: The instructions on the box are very confusing.
sentences.cn: 盒子上的使用说明令人费解。

sentences.en: The instructions were not just confusing, they were positively misleading.
sentences.cn: 这些指示不单令人迷惑，而且肯定会误导人。

sentences.en: The next instructions will add these for the service.
sentences.cn: 下面的说明将为服务添加这些信息。

sentences.en: The washing instructions are on the label.
We remember our mother's stern instructions not to boast.
sentences.cn: 我们谨记母亲不许我们在人前炫耀的严厉教诲。

sentences.en: Will you kindly obey the instructions I am about to give?
sentences.cn: 劳驾你服从我要给出的指令好不好？
